sentences.simplifiedText: 根据公司的声明，他们明天将在全球范围内发布全新的软件。
sentences.traditionalText: 根據公司的聲明，他們明天將在全球範圍內發布全新的軟件。
sentences.pinyin: Gēnjù gōngsī de shēngmíng, tāmen míngtiān jiāng zài quánqiú fànwéi nèi fābù quánxīn de ruǎnjiàn.
sentences.translation: According to the company's statement, they will release the brand new software worldwide tomorrow.

sentences.simplifiedText: 教育部宣布校园恢复开放。
sentences.traditionalText: 教育部宣布校園恢復開放。
sentences.translation: The Ministry of Education announces the reopening of campuses.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于疫情得到了控制，教育部宣布全国所有学校将从下周开始恢复开放。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於疫情得到了控制，教育部宣布全國所有學校將從下周開始恢復開放。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú yìqíng dédàole kòngzhì, jiàoyùbù xuānbù quánguó suǒyǒu xuéxiào jiāng cóng xià zhōu kāishǐ huīfù kāifàng.
sentences.translation: With the epidemic under control, the Ministry of Education has announced that all schools across the country will resume opening from next week.
